actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Clara Barton House National Historic Site in the State of Maryland, and for other purposes.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Provides for the establishment of the Cara Barton House National Historic Site in the State of Maryland. Authorizes the appropriation of not in excess of $47,450 to carry out the purpose of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the establishment of the Clara Barton House National Historic Site in the State of Maryland, and for other purposes.
